suite.name: Negative Dispatch Tests

kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=fire_dispatch, url=http://localhost:5000, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: Session created with base URL: http://localhost:5000
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

test.name: Incomplete Dispatch

kw.name: Send Incomplete Dispatch And Expect Error
Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Expect Error
POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:5000/api/dispatch path_url=/api/dispatch headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.3', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '60', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"incident_id": "99999", "type": "Fire", "priority": "High"}'
HTTPError: 400 Client Error: BAD REQUEST for url: http://localhost:5000/api/dispatch
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.status: HTTPError: 400 Client Error: BAD REQUEST for url: http://localhost:5000/api/dispatch

kw.doc: Runs the keyword and checks that the expected error occurred.

test.doc: Try sending a dispatch without location and expect error

test.name: Empty or Null Fields

kw.name: Send Dispatch With Empty Or Null Fields
Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:5000/api/dispatch path_url=/api/dispatch headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.3', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '71', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"incident_id": "", "location": null, "type": "", "priority": "Medium"}'
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.name: Call Method
kw.doc: Calls the named method of the given object with the provided arguments.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: Full error response: {'error': 'Missing or empty field: incident_id'}
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Dictionary Should Contain Key
kw.doc: Fails if ``key`` is not found from ``dictionary``.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

test.doc: Try sending invalid dispatch with empty or null fields and validate error response
